fields.name: fiscal_yr
fields.title: Fiscal Year
fields.description: Identifies the fiscal year (April 1 to March 31) during which service activities took place. For example, records for fiscal year 2023-2024 should include applications received from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024.

fields.name: service_id
fields.title: Service ID Number
fields.description: The unique number assigned to a service in the inventory to make it easier to refer to specific services.

fields.name: service_name_en
fields.title: Service Name (English)
fields.description: Identifies the official name of the service.

fields.name: service_name_fr
fields.title: Service Name (French)
fields.description: Identifies the official name of the service.

fields.name: service_standard_id
fields.title: Service Standard ID
fields.description: Identifies the unique number assigned to each service standard for that service. Makes it easier for reference purposes as one service may have multiple standards.

fields.name: service_standard_en
fields.title: Service Standard (English)
fields.description: Identifies the service standard related to a particular service. See Guideline on Service and Digital for format to be used when defining service standards.

fields.name: service_standard_fr
fields.title: Service Standard (French)
fields.description: Identifies the service standard related to a particular service. See Guideline on Service and Digital for format to be used when defining service standards.

fields.name: type
fields.title: Service Standard Type
fields.description: Identifies the type of service standard as defined in the Guideline on Service and Digital. Access: a commitment outlining the ease and convenience the client should experience when attempting to access a service. Accuracy: a commitment stipulating that the client will receive a service that is up to date, free of errors, and complete. Timeliness: a commitment stating how long the client should expect to wait to receive a service once the service has been accessed.

fields.name: channel
fields.title: Service Standard Channel
fields.description: Identifies the service channel to which the service standard applies

fields.name: channel_comments_en
fields.title: Comments on the service standard channel (English)
fields.description: Comments related to the service standard channel and provides explanation of "Other" channel selection.

fields.name: channel_comments_fr
fields.title: Comments on the service standard channel (French)
fields.description: Comments related to the service standard channel and provides explanation of "Other" channel selection.

fields.name: target
fields.title: Service Standard Target
fields.description: The frequency that the organization expects to meet service standard (reported as a percentage).

fields.name: volume_meeting_target
fields.title: Business Volume That Met Service Standard Target
fields.description: Identifies the number of final outputs issued appropriate to the service (eg. payments issued, requests completed, etc) during the fiscal year that met a particular service standard target for a service. Blank indicates no information available, while 0 indicates that no final outputs issued met service standard targets. Note, this value must be less than or equal to the Total Volume.

fields.name: total_volume
fields.title: Total Volume
fields.description: Identifies the total number of final outputs issued appropriate to the service (eg. payments issued, requests completed, etc) during the fiscal year. Blank indicates no information available, while 0 indicates no final outputs issued.

fields.name: comments_en
fields.title: Comments on the service standard in general (English)
fields.description: Comments related to the service standard in general.

fields.name: comments_fr
fields.title: Comments on the service standard in general (French)
fields.description: Comments related to the service standard in general.

fields.name: standards_targets_uri_en
fields.title: URL to Service Standards and Targets (English)
fields.description: Identifies the departmental webpage (Canada.ca) where the service standards and targets are published.

fields.name: standards_targets_uri_fr
fields.title: URL to Service Standards and Targets (French)
fields.description: Identifies the departmental webpage (Canada.ca) where the service standards and targets are published.

fields.name: performance_results_uri_en
fields.title: URL to Real-Time Performance Results (English)
fields.description: Identifies the departmental webpage where the real-time performance results for a service are published.

fields.name: performance_results_uri_fr
fields.title: URL to Real-Time Performance Results (French)
fields.description: Identifies the departmental webpage where the real-time performance results for a service are published.
